name: Charlotte Montdor
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn DON!!-1, then rest this Character: Your opponent places 2 cards from their trash to the bottom of their deck in any order. Then, add the top card of your Life cards to your hand.

effect.text: Your opponent places 2 cards from their trash to the bottom of their deck in any order. Then, add the top card of your Life cards to your hand.
